posts.title: Vue.js: The Documentary
posts.summary: by honeypot.io | What began as a side project of a Google developer now shares the JS leaderboard with #Reactjs and #Angularjs... Evan You tells the story of how he fought against the odds to bring #Vuejs to life.  Coming to a screen near you on Feb 24th!

posts.title: liuli-cli，一个 JavaScript/TypeScript SDK CLI 工具
posts.summary: 写了个小工具稍微宣发一下：liuli-cli，一个 JavaScript/TypeScript SDK CLI 工具，帮助前端库的开发者快速生成一个开箱即用 SDK，避免在每个项目都复制一堆的配置文件或都去踩一些坑。
